content: Can you provide a table of the typical features of a smartphone, comparing the specifications of the latest models from top manufacturers such as Apple, Samsung, and Google? The table should include features such as screen size, display type, camera resolution, battery capacity, processor speed, storage options, and operating system version.

Certainly! Here's a comparison table of some of the latest smartphone models from top manufacturers as of October 2023, including key specifications like screen size, display type, camera resolution, battery capacity, processor speed, storage options, and operating system version:

| Feature              | Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max | Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra | Google Pixel 8 Pro  |
|----------------------|-------------------------|--------------------------|---------------------|
| **Screen Size**      | 6.7 inches              | 6.8 inches               | 6.7 inches          |
| **Display Type**     | Super Retina XDR OLED   | Dynamic AMOLED 2X        | LTPO OLED           |
| **Camera Resolution**| 48 MP (main)            | 200 MP (main)            | 50 MP (main)        |
| **Battery Capacity** | 4,352 mAh               | 5,000 mAh                | 4,950 mAh           |
| **Processor Speed**  | A17 Bionic              | Snapdragon 8 Gen 2       | Google Tensor G4    |
| **Storage Options**  | 128GB, 256GB, 512GB, 1TB| 256GB, 512GB, 1TB        | 128GB, 256GB, 512GB |
| **Operating System** | iOS 17                  | Android 13 (One UI 5)    | Android 14          |

Note: Specifications can vary based on regional releases and updates. Always verify with the manufacturer for the most accurate specifications.
